column1: Hob Hayward was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Hob was a two-feathered Shirriff. Before the War of the Ring
column2: he had watched Bucklands Buckland Gate. He was well acquainted with the Brandybuck Family.

column1: During Lotho Sackville-Bagginss reign over the Shire
column2: the Shirriffs were reorganized. Hob was old
column3: and one of several shirriffs who were to guard the new fence at the Brandywine Bridge under the command of Bill Ferny.

column1: When Frodo Baggins and his Travellers returned from their adventure
column2: they found Hob at the gate who forbade them to enter the fence gate. After they chased off Ferny
column3: Hob informed them of the changes in their homeland.
